pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

related.meaning: revival (of an old system, custom, fashion, etc.)

lessons.japanese: 現在、通常のサービスの早急な復旧に努めています。
lessons.english: We are currently working to restore normal service as soon as possible.

lessons.japanese: 現在、通常のサービスの早急な復旧に努めています。
lessons.english: We are currently working to restore normal service as soon as possible.

lessons.japanese: パスワードを復旧するため、確認用の質問にお答えください。
lessons.english: Answer the following question to receive your password.

lessons.japanese: パスワードを復旧するため、確認用の質問にお答えください。
lessons.english: Answer the following question to receive your password.

lessons.japanese: システム障害の復旧作業は、徹夜作業となりました。
lessons.english: The work that needed to be done to repair the system damage continued all throughout the night.

lessons.japanese: システム障害の復旧作業は、徹夜作業となりました。
lessons.english: The work that needed to be done to repair the system damage continued all throughout the night.
